secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'Z'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Zebra" and "Zucchini".

However, I want to acknowledge that with only two examples, this is a tentative guess. To be fully confident, I would typically want more context or additional examples to validate the rule.

Correct! The rule is The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'Z'.
